mapper.sql: id, login_name, loan_id, amount, status, source, is_auto_invest, created_time
mapper.update: update invest set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select invest.id, invest.login_name, invest.loan_id, invest.amount, invest.status, invest.source, invest.is_auto_invest, invest.created_time from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL' order by invest.created_time desc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where invest.login_name = #{loginName} and loan.status <> 'CANCEL'
select from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS' order by created_time
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS'
select count(1) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = '${status}'

select loan.periods,loan.name as loan_name, u.mobile, u.email, invest.amount,invest.id as invest_id from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id inner join user u on u.login_name = invest.login_name where loan.id = #{loanId} and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and login_name = #{loginName} and status = 'SUCCESS'
select count(*) from invest inner join loan on invest.loan_id = loan.id where loan.activity_type = 'NOVICE' and invest.login_name = #{loginName} and invest.status <> 'FAIL'
select count(*) from invest where loan_id = #{loanId} and status = 'SUCCESS'
